name: Jeju's fantasy
description:
A dark spell has been casted over most of the creature to gain control over them. Venture into an atmospheric world as you become the hero of this story and try to restore normality.

Craft unique weapons
Collect items as you advance in your adventure and use them as materials. Some rare items can become very powerful weapons.

Choose your companion
Don't explore this beautiful world alone! Make new friends and uncover pets to travel with you and complement your fighting abilities.

Dynamic Dialogue
Choose your answers as you progress through the story and receive different outcomes.
